post_text: Everyone deserves the right to make informed decisions about their own bodies.
Every life is precious from the moment of conception.
We must respect a woman's right to choose, no matter the circumstances.
The right to life should always be protected.
Access to abortion is essential healthcare.
Abortion is a moral failure, and we need to stand against it.
Safe and legal abortion must remain a priority for our country.
Life begins at conception, and we need to protect that life.
Reproductive rights are human rights, period.
No child should be denied the right to live.
Women deserve the right to control their reproductive health.
Every unborn child deserves a chance at life.
Abortion access is about equality for all.
Ending a pregnancy is ending a life.
It's time to ensure reproductive rights for every woman.
Abortion should never be an option.
We need to keep abortion safe and accessible.
Stand up for those who cannot speak for themselves.
We cannot go back to a time when abortion was illegal.
Abortion ends a life and damages society.
Everyone deserves the right to make their own choices.
The unborn have rights too, and we need to fight for them.
Abortion is healthcare, and it should remain a woman's choice.
Protect the future generations by standing against abortion.
With Roe v. Wade overturned, women everywhere are facing a future without access to safe abortions.
A woman's health decisions should never be dictated by politics.
We must be the voice for the voiceless.
We need to fight for reproductive justice for all women.
Abortion is wrong and must be stopped.
Abortion access is fundamental to gender equality.
All life is sacred and must be protected.
The recent ban in Texas shows we are moving in the right direction to protect life.
